FuncDef:
The shutdown command deactivates a PVP.
The undo shutdown command activates a PVP.
By default, a PVP is activated on an interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before managing services on a PVP, such as debugging or terminating services, run the shutdown command to deactivate the PVP.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
